fields.offer: Get extra ₹200 off on prepaid orders
fields.description: Equipped with Bluetooth 5.4, these headphones ensure fast pairing and stable connections, while Type-C fast charging keeps you powered up with minimal downtime. Personalize your listening with four EQ modes—Bass, Rock, Pop, and Vocal—tailored to match your favorite genres. Built with IPX5 water resistance, they’re ready for workouts, travel, and daily commutes. Plus, with AUX support, you can switch to wired listening anytime. Every purchase is backed by a 1-year warranty, easily activated through the official website.
